locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Dirty shower and parking lot. trash had no been emptied, hair all over the shower. toilet was not cleaned. the employee was too busy on his phone. no dennys. ihop coming soon but for now just pizza and that stuff. only giving 2 stars cause ‚Ä¶

Nice hot shower. Lots of parking. When trying to order pizza was told quote‚Äù now is not the time‚Äù. The deli person didn‚Äôt show up for work so no one there, not even the manager knew how to bake a pizza, obviously they just didn‚Äôt wanna make ‚Ä¶

AWSOME SHOWER GREAT STAFF PATIENT WITH ME I HAVE DISABILITIES THANKS FOR WALKING ON

SAM'S JOURNEY

My JOURNEY PICS HALL OF FAME ENJOY MY PILOT I LOVE PILOT THANKS FOR CARING
‚Ä¶ You can find a FedEx and UPS drop box here if you are looking to drop off a package. The facilities here are really clean and you can even take a shower if you'd like. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , we need the resting areas to be available to us. There are times that we have no time to use the rest room- and take a shower but when we do, ‚ÄúUnfortunately‚Äù it is ‚ÄúCLOSED‚Äù. It is unacceptable for the resting area (to take a shower) ‚Ä¶

I work in construction and find myself on the road for two or three weeks at a time quite often so I come here from time to time to take a shower. it's a great place with great people. I've always been treated very friendly, until today. ‚Ä¶

Really getting run down. Lack of maintenance.  All trash cans were full . Almost all showers were dirty. The shower I had was not cleaned. Just put new towels in and lifted the toilet seat. Sure has gone down hill.  Dennys has been closed ‚Ä¶
One of the best places to shower at Flying J. They actually clean and water pressure is great. And they stay on top of cleaning the showers. Very nice shower attendants!!!
Shower was nice compared to other pilot showers, ihop was a nice change from fast food. No complaints in parking or fueling either. DD Trucker reviews

‚Ä¶ bad reviews. I don't know about that because I don't like at any Denny's location. But, this is the cleanest truck stop shower I have ever seen in the U.S. I am Canadian and some of these places I refuse to shower but I found this location ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ‚Äúhi welcome to loves‚Äù the whole weekend. 3, I don‚Äôt understand how you ‚Äúpunish‚Äù all drivers by not providing wash rags in the shower since one silly driver flushed them down the toilet. Seems a bit petty. Overall the store was very ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ -Has showers available 24/7. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , Petro-Pass or Pipeline?  Here you are in the USA!  Whether it is you, Pilot/Flying J, TA Travel Center/Petro Stopping Center, you normally provide service to each of the truckers at each shower.  Please be careful and neglect any of us!
Thank You Love‚Äôs. You are not the cheapest fueling stop in our network but I will pay the extra to have a clean shower.

Frist shower no water pressure  no towels second shower low water pressure Luke warm water at best bearly tell difference from cold to hot . 55¬∞ out side AC blowing on u in the cold shower air felt colder then temp out side. Told manager ‚Ä¶

No water due to a water main break.  Just drove here for the night so I use the bathroom and shower after a long day.  Now I don‚Äôt know what the point of driving here is, even a rest area has working bathrooms
Passed through the area trucking. Nice clean showers, I especially like the lower shower head for cleaning out the ol buttshole after a few long days in the seat.
Great staff, clean store and shower. Thanks for your excellent service.
Cold shower

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice n clean place. Personnel is friendly. Do not let the signs scare you, overnight parking is free with 10$ purchase in store. Price sounds fair to me, you can tell they use the money to improve the place. At 8pm on a weekday there were still a few spots open. Will come again

This place was pretty nice and I felt safe when my fianc√© went in to the bathroom. It was well lit and easy to navigate. The selection wasn‚Äôt huge, but it was much better than your average convenience store :)

What a neat place! Clean & stocked store, nice personnel. Pizza, turnovers/doughnuts. Fountain drinks/ coffee. Lots of goodies, snacks & souvenirs. There‚Äôs a ‚ÄúJersey Giant subs‚Äù inside, all fresh. Also a restaurant called ‚ÄúBears diner‚Äù. ‚Ä¶

IDK if this gas station/truck stop/sandwich shop/convenience store/trucker supply changes owners often or if the long term owners invest in updates frequently but it is always getting updates and increasing it's coolness factor. Bathrooms ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I was working close by there getting done late and wanting to go Doordaah... I stopped here they have $5 showers and both Bathroom and Shower area are Super Clean!!! I appreciate that!!! Staff on the late shift are Awesome!! üòé ‚Ä¶
Shower was very dirty sewer gas coming up through the drain in floor sink would not drain and was full of hair hot water only lasted about 7 minutes i guess that's what u get for 5 dollars
The last post a month ago nothing changed same nasty shower and restroom
Great place to shower
It's good. Not huge. Chicken but the pizza shop is closed down. No restaurant. One shower, with towels. Scale, not CAT scale. C store, standard gas station stuff.
Great workers here, great , fantastic even Shower(s)here too. Very helpful workers that are here.small place, but decent small, not TOO Small however. Great place to be ...
love the People who work there, They have a beautiful great Shower here, $5.3o.per.
Parking, less expensive fuel, food and shower.  Good place to stop for the night!
Cheap clean $5 shower no towels

showerReviews.reviewText: The service was wonderful (on both shifts), the store was clean, restrooms and showers clean but... the water smells!!! I was told is well water. I know I'm clean after the shower but at the same time I feel like I stink worse than before ‚Ä¶

Shower floor was cracked and had black mold. One of the staff was really rude. I left my shampoo and soap and when I went back into grab it I was told it was left therefore I couldn't get it back. I will not be back. I'll stick to Loves.

I am a truck driver. Been stopping here for 18 years. Place has been getting nice updates but showers are a problem. Went in today to shower and urine all over toilet. Was never cleaned. I've noticed this alot lately.  Plus my man and I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ actually care about the drivers it seems only the money they get from small item sales. Bathrooms so out of date, showers are worse. Shower rule says husband and wife must take seperate showers for safety ,and health reasons. Funny ‚Ä¶
This place was terrible! She told me after I bought 400 $ In fuel that she didn‚Äôt have time for me to shower that the owner would kick me out ! Don‚Äôt waste youre time here
Very clean place. The clerks are friendly and the shower rooms were large and very clean but the water smells. I'd stop again if we were coming through

LUV THIS PLACE. IF U R KINDA HOMELESS U CAN BUY A 1 HOUR SHOWER FOR $6. I LOVE THE NEW THINGS STUFF THEY SELL. MSU STUFF,LOTS OF DIFFERENT LITERS,ASHTRAYS,HATS BANDANS,SUNGLASSES,KEY CHAINS. EMOJI STUFF üòÅ. I USUALLY STOP WHEN IM ON MY WAY ‚Ä¶
Nice place they have good shower for truck drivers
Free shower

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Bathrooms and showers are older but clean and well maintained. The shower costs $16 (27.April.2023). Ladies working there were nice and helpful. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Clean. Empty semi parking spots  even at midnight (probably due to lack of truck traffic on I-69 in Southern Michigan) Showers are pricey at $15. Most other places I‚Äôve showered are $12 and I‚Äôve even come across a couple of $10 showers. Th ‚Ä¶
It's descent, lots of parking spots. Came here for a pm on the truck, laundry and shower. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Smallish shower stalls but 10/10 for water pressure and steaming hot water - that's all I need. ‚Ä¶

Top 3 showers since being a OTR driver!! I had bay 2, water pressure was top notch and you can tell the owner drops some coin into the water softener!! Unlike petro or pilot down the streetüôÑ, where there‚Äôs a ZERO water treatment program( ‚Ä¶

Lots of parking. Shower is extremely small and overpriced for what you get. I think the staff hate their job and seem annoyed anytime they have to do anything, especially the night lady. I think if she smiled her face would crack. Can't ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ with perfect amenities for the travelers. Definitely a delight to visit. Shop, browse, arcade, food, wash, shower,laundry, ect... Great employees that go above and beyond to make your visit enjoyable. Thanks for being there when I need ‚Ä¶

I tried to get fuel and get a shower with my ultra one card but I hadn't used it in about a year so they denied me use of a shower pretty pretty rude if you ask me I think they were on a power trip I'll never spend a red cent of my money at ‚Ä¶

I regret stopping here in hope to get a free shower with purchased fuel. Showers are cash ONLY!!! I'll pay $12-15 for a shower but not at the place where drivers aren't appreciated.
Restaurant is permanently closed BTW.
Would give 2 1/2 if I could. On the plus side shower was nice and clean so was the laundry room. But the coffee sucked!!!! It tasted like they just reused the grounds again. Horrible!!!!!

The cashier who rang up my $8 shower (that‚Äôs a win) was kind and welcoming. Thanks for offering hot showers in a clean establishment!!

Showed up a weary traveler, left a happy camper!!

Sooooo much appreciated!!
Worst place to go for a shower I was a loyal customer and I'll never return back to that store I would not recommend anybody to go for a shower

‚Ä¶ and service!  Connected to convenience store for a quick stop for road trip snacks, beverages and even some cute gift ideas.  It's also a truck stop for pro drivers to relax and get in a shower before heading back to the highway!  Clean.
Very nice staff, nice clean shower, only $8 without fuel :-) Everything in the c-store is neat and orderly!

Freindly cashier Plenty of free parking hot shower that don't break the  bank 5 bucks 2 towels an a washcloth as well as sit down, restaurant on same property

The truck stop is separate from the restaurant which is called petticoat junction.  There‚Äôs lots of truck parking and they do have a shower available just ask the girls inside. Staff is always happy to help.

showerReviews.reviewText: I already had a good experience at this place showers are really clean. The guy who cleans the shower is really nice guy. He helped me and the restaurant is very nice and clean. They are all fast at providing food and service. The guys at ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ But 2 stars or less for the driver showers. ‚Ä¶

Shower has rust and stinky water. Refill coffee charges same as with Cup even your mug won't change price. OK customer service. Other day water shutdown when I'm showering. And called customer service to get credit and No response from them ‚Ä¶

Do not shower here. Charges $16 for shower that is covered in rust. Not one but all the showers. I'd understand if they were only charging $5 dollars for one. We as truckers understand you get what you pay for but $16 for a shower covered ‚Ä¶

Can‚Äôt shower here due to the heavy rust metal water smell in the showers. Night cashier said they switched to the old well water or something. Basically yeah it‚Äôs problem but oh well who cares next customer!
Clean restrooms good clean shower good pretty good food for the restaurant the water is not all that great and plenty of parking.

‚Ä¶ After a couple of tough, busy, and tiring days, hubby and I came to this truck stop to shower and recharge. Got our showers and noticed there was a wait. No biggie as it was in the early evening when showers typically get busy. ‚Ä¶

If you like more water out of the shower this is the place. Just about needed 5 towels so I could get dressed. Maybe just maybe the management would think, hey a shower curtain would be great. Not going to happen because management can't ‚Ä¶
Shower doesn't work.  Show Estimate time 2 min , but I waited 1 h , and nothing

Parked here at 3pm, went in to take a shower only to find no showers were clean and nobody was cleaning them. I didn't stay, went across the highway to the pilot and got a nice clean shower right away.
